dcterms:description: The CCEP dataset consists of cortico-cortical evoked potentials recorded from patients with epilepsy to aid in localizing the seizure onset zone. It includes time series data and metadata features such as anatomical location and tissue type.
dcterms:title: CCEP Dataset

dcterms:description: The Brainnetome Atlas is a new brain atlas based on the connectional architecture of the human brain, providing anatomical and functional information.
dcterms:title: Brainnetome Atlas

dcterms:creator: T. S. Davis
J. D. Rolston
R. J. Bollo
P. A. House
dcterms:description: SOZ Labels are used to identify the seizure onset zone in patients with refractory epilepsy based on delayed high-frequency suppression after electrical stimulation.
dcterms:title: SOZ Labels

dcterms:description: Seven distinct train-test datasets derived from the CCEP dataset, created to prevent data leakage and assess model performance in localizing the seizure onset zone.
dcterms:title: Seven Distinct Train-Test Datasets
